action.name: GetCurrentActivityID
action.run: local status, actID = Harmony_GetCurrentActivtyID() return actID

action.name: SetPollInterval
action.run: -- Do no accept poll interval below 10 seconds to avoid hub overload local newInt = tonumber(lul_settings.newPollInterval or "0") if ((newInt ~= 0) and (newInt < 10)) then newInt = 10 end varSet("PollInterval", newInt) -- When not zero start polling now if (newInt ~= 0) then luup.call_delay("Harmony_PollCurrentActivity", newInt, "", false) end

action.name: IssueDeviceCommand
action.job: Harmony_IssueDeviceCommand(lul_settings.DeviceID or "", lul_settings.Command or "", lul_settings.Duration or "0") return 4,nil

action.name: SetTarget
action.job: local newTarget = lul_settings.newTargetValue or "" local curTarget = varGet("Target", HData.DEVICE, HData.SWSID) if (newTarget ~= curTarget) then if (newTarget == '1') then local newActivityID = varGet('DefaultActivity') if (newActivityID ~= '') then Harmony_StartActivity(newActivityID) end else Harmony_StartActivity('-1') end end return 4,nil

action.name: GetTarget
action.run: local val = varGet("Target", HData.DEVICE, HData.SWSID) return val

action.name: GetStatus
action.run: local val = varGet("Status", HData.DEVICE, HData.SWSID) return val
